actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authorities of the Secretary of Education (formerly subject to congressional veto) relating to specified schedules of expected family contributions and student need analysis for purposes of student aid under the Higher Education Act of 1965, unless the exercise of such authorities is approved by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authorities of the executive branch of the Government which are subject to congressional review unless those authorities are approved by an enactment of the Congress.
